Ikenberry Commons.description: You are at the north entry of the Ikenberry Commons, near Wassaja Hall. There seems to be no student in sight. Weird.

Dining Hall Key.name: Dining Hall Key
Dining Hall Key.description: You pick up a silver key used to unlock the Ikenberry Dining Hall.

The Ike.description: You are at the Ike, a hub for all Ikenberry activities.

Blood-Stained iCard.name: Blood-Stained iCard
Blood-Stained iCard.description: WHAT! You pick up your best friend's iCard with blood stains. He's from Wassaja Hall. You should check this out.

Ikenberry Dining Hall.description: You are at the south entry of the Ike Dining Hall. The room's a mess and there's a rotten smell coming from the kitchen.
